snippet: A short Baroque work written as a cautionary tale to uppity women becomes a showcase for female independence in Musica Nuova’s production of Monteverdi’s “Ballo Delle Ingrate.”
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews Musica Nuova production of Monteverdi opera Il Ballo Delle Ingrate at Le Poisson Rouge in Greenwich Village.
lead_paragraph: A short Baroque work written as a cautionary tale to uppity women becomes a showcase for female independence in Musica Nuova’s production of Monteverdi’s “Ballo Delle Ingrate.”

headline.seo: Monteverdi’s ‘Ballo Delle Ingrate,’ With a Different Spin
